column3: but was consistently forgettable and never quite made it into the fully realized stages of an original and complex adult dish. To top the experience off
column4: at the end of the meal
column5: we asked for a split check
column6: which our waitress promptly forgot about. Perhaps Seattle has spoiled me with its devilishly thought-out details
column8: in a city that's supposed to be a foodie town
column9: I wasn't all that excited about the food at Little Goat.
